rows.label: qst702204_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah! This is the key, ma'am!
There's no mistake, ma'am!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0002
rows.name:
Next time, try not to accidentally
enter any dens, okay?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0003
rows.name: Yes, ma'am! Thank you, ma'am!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0004
rows.name: About that, Veritas.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0005
rows.name: I think you should take some time off.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0006
rows.name: You don't have to go that far...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0007
rows.name: No, it's important.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0008
rows.name:
The herb you were collecting
was Clearbright, for blood
diseases, wasn't it?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0009
rows.name: ...!! Th-that's...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0010
rows.name:
Come to think of it, you were
collecting herbs for your
grandmother, weren't you?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0011
rows.name:
Clearbright is rare and used to
treat serious illnesses, I hear.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0012
rows.name: ...So that's why you went so far?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0013
rows.name:
You can go once your work here is
done. Go and visit your grandmother.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0014
rows.name:
There is no treasure more
precious than life.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0015
rows.name: Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0016
rows.name:
Could it be, the most important
thing not in the vault is...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0017
rows.name:
As long as you're alive, you can
overcome most anything. There's no
greater asset than that, is there?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0018
rows.name:
Then... I humbly accept
my dismissal, sir.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0019
rows.name:
Um, if there's anything you need,
I can get it from the vault, sir.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0020
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0021
rows.name: Laura, is there anything you'd like?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0022
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0023
rows.name:
This is thanks to your
cooperation. Ask for anything.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0024
rows.name: "Anything," you say...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0025
rows.name:
...How about a recipe for a really
delicious dish from your family?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0026
rows.name: Laura...

rows.label: qst702204_msg0027
rows.name: W-well, I'm curious, aren't I?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0028
rows.name:
Hehe, you can't be energetic
when you're hungry.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0029
rows.name: Then Veritas, the recipe.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0030
rows.name:
And could you also bring
some books that might be
useful on our journey?

rows.label: qst702204_msg0031
rows.name:
Yes, sir! I'll bring
them right away, sir!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0032
rows.name:
Thank you for waiting, sir! I've
chosen the best ones, sir!

rows.label: qst702204_msg0033
rows.name:
I can't thank you enough for this, sir.
I'll pass this story down to my children
and my children's children, sir.

rows.label: qst702204_msg0034
rows.name:
My debt to you, Adel-sama and
Laura-sama, I will never, ever
forget it, sir and ma'am!
